scripts.build:footer: cd footer && npm run build && mv ./dist/**/*.js ../src/furo/assets/scripts/footer.js && mv ./dist/**/*.css ../src/furo/assets/styles/footer.css
scripts.build:header: cd header && npm run build && mv ./dist/**/*.js ../src/furo/assets/scripts/header.js && mv ./dist/**/*.css ../src/furo/assets/styles/header.css
scripts.build: npm run build:footer && npm run build:header && webpack
